message.content: Let me insert the code review fixes after the existing entry:

function.arguments:
{"command": "str_replace", "path": "/workspace/SheepVibes/CHANGELOG.md", "old_str": "
- Feed name and site link are automatically updated when URL is changed

", "new_str": "
- Feed name and site link are automatically updated when URL is changed
- **Fix: Addressed all Gemini Code Assist review comments for PR #100**
  - Fixed backend performance issue by replacing redundant `fetch_and_update_feed` call with direct `process_feed_entries` to avoid duplicate network requests
- Updated frontend API configuration to use relative paths for production deployment
- Fixed frontend error handling syntax and improved user experience in edit modal


", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: str_replace_editor

content:
The file /workspace/SheepVibes/CHANGELOG.md has been edited. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of /workspace/SheepVibes/CHANGELOG.md:
     7	  - Added edit button (✎) to each feed widget in the frontend
     8	  - Implemented modal dialog for editing feed URLs with validation
     9	  - Added comprehensive tests for the new functionality
    10	  - Feed name and site link are automatically updated when URL is changed
    11	- **Fix: Addressed all Gemini Code Assist review comments for PR #100**
    12	  - Fixed backend performance issue by replacing redundant `fetch_and_update_feed` call with direct `process_feed_entries` to avoid duplicate network requests
    13	- Updated frontend API configuration to use relative paths for production deployment
    14	- Fixed frontend error handling syntax and improved user experience in edit modal
    15	
    16	## 2025-07-26
    17	
    18	- **Fix(feed_service): Use entry link as GUID to prevent UNIQUE constraint errors**
    19	
Review the changes and make sure they are as expected. Edit the file again if necessary.

extras.old_content: - Feed name and site link are automatically updated when URL is changed
extras.new_content:
- Feed name and site link are automatically updated when URL is changed
- **Fix: Addressed all Gemini Code Assist review comments for PR #100**
  - Fixed backend performance issue by replacing redundant `fetch_and_update_feed` call with direct `process_feed_entries` to avoid duplicate network requests
- Updated frontend API configuration to use relative paths for production deployment
- Fixed frontend error handling syntax and improved user experience in edit modal
extras.diff:
--- /workspace/SheepVibes/CHANGELOG.md
+++ /workspace/SheepVibes/CHANGELOG.md
@@ -10,0 +11,4 @@
+- **Fix: Addressed all Gemini Code Assist review comments for PR #100**
+  - Fixed backend performance issue by replacing redundant `fetch_and_update_feed` call with direct `process_feed_entries` to avoid duplicate network requests
+- Updated frontend API configuration to use relative paths for production deployment
+- Fixed frontend error handling syntax and improved user experience in edit modal
